directions.step:
*** 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 lb. Lobsters (split and claws cracked) Heat oven to 375F. Remove any tomalley (green liver) from lobsters; mash it and reserve. Place lobsters, split side up, in large, flat baking pan. In bowl, combine crumbs, 1/4 cup of the melted butter, Worcestershire, an d wine. Add tomalley. Lightly spoon mixture into lobster cavities. Sprinkl e exposed meat of lobster with melted butter. Bake uncovered, 35 to 40 minutes. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley. Serve with additional melted butter.
Posted to EAT-L Digest 09 Aug 96
Date: Sat, 10 Aug 1996 22:37:19 -0400
From: Ken Gomberg <kgomberg@MINT.NET>
